title: Fake It Til You Make It: Unit Testing Patterns With Mocks and Fakes
summary:
In this talk, aimed at intermediate Pythonistas, we'll have a look at
some common, simple patterns in code, and the testing patterns that go
with them. We'll also discover what makes some code more testable than
others, and how mocks and fakes can help isolate the code to be tested
(and why you want to do that). Finally, we'll touch on some tools to
help make writing and running tests easier.
